channel.title: Examples :: The ABS Modeling Language
channel.description: This page features a list of examples â€“ small and large complete ABS models that illustrate various modeling techniques. The Monty Hall ProblemModeling simple behavior, getting complex results. Modeling and Visualizing Calendar TimeAn example for using Real-Time ABS to calculate with real (calendar) dates and times and visualize them on a graphical timeline. Modeling and Visualizing A Water Tank ControllerAn example for discrete-time simulation of a simple physical system and controller using Real-Time ABS.

item.title: The Monty Hall Problem
item.description: Modeling simple behavior, getting complex results.

item.title: Modeling and Visualizing Calendar Time
item.description: An example for using Real-Time ABS to calculate with real (calendar) dates and times and visualize them on a graphical timeline.

item.title: Modeling and Visualizing A Water Tank Controller
item.description: An example for discrete-time simulation of a simple physical system and controller using Real-Time ABS.

item.title: ABS Model of a Multicore Memory System
item.description: A model of the MSI cache coherency protocol.
